title: Regenerate favicon set from uploaded Heart.png and ensure index.html references resolve

requirements.text: Generate a complete favicon PNG asset set from the user-uploaded image `Heart.png`, exporting each favicon at the exact sizes and filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html`, and add/overwrite the files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

quotes: Please use this image for the Favicon.

acceptanceCriteria: All generated icons visually match the uploaded `Heart.png` (centered heart within the circular badge) when viewed at their respective sizes.

requirements.text: Ensure `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link>` tags (paths, filenames, and sizes) exactly match the generated assets under `/assets/generated/` so the browser can load them at runtime; update `frontend/index.html` only if needed to keep it aligned with the generated filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: The following references in `frontend/index.html` resolve to existing files in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`: `/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`.

requirements.text: Replace the root favicon file `frontend/public/favicon.ico` with an `.ico` generated from the same uploaded `Heart.png` source so browsers that request `/favicon.ico` also display the correct icon.

quotes: Please use this image for the Favicon.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/favicon.ico` is updated and contains the heart-based favicon (not the previous placeholder).
Loading `/favicon.ico` in the browser displays the heart icon.

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend/immutablePaths` listed in system context.
Keep favicon asset filenames and paths exactly aligned with those referenced by `frontend/index.html` (or update `frontend/index.html` to match the generated filenames).
All static favicon images must be stored as frontend static assets under `frontend/public/` (not served/generated by the backend).
nonGoals: No changes to backend canisters or Motoko state.
No changes to application features, routes, authentication, or UI beyond favicon asset wiring.

required: Heart favicon (white circular badge with centered pink heart) (favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, 16x16)
Heart favicon (white circular badge with centered pink heart) (favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, 32x32)
Heart favicon (white circular badge with centered pink heart) (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, 180x180)
Heart favicon (white circular badge with centered pink heart) (android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, 192x192)
Heart favicon (white circular badge with centered pink heart) (android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
